Title: FOSUserBundle User Identity Validation Vulnerability
Description: Versions of FOSUserBundle prior to 1.2.1 have been found to be vulnerable to a security issue related to user identity validation. Specifically, user refreshing was performed using the primary key instead of the username, leading to a potential security risk if a user is allowed to change their username. The fix in version 1.2.1 addresses this issue by loading the user using the primary key during refreshing.
NotImpacted: All versions before 1.2.0, all versions starting from 1.2.1
